mapper.select:
select a.* from BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN a
and a.SOLUTIONNAME=#SOLUTIONNAME# and a.GUID=#GUID#
order by a.createtime
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN ( guid, SOLUTIONNAME, createtime, createuserguid, updatetime, updateuserguid
) select #GUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #SOLUTIONNAME:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #CREATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#, #CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, #UPDATEUSERGUID:VARCHAR:NULL#
mapper.update:
UPDATE BI_TRANSFORM_SIGN
updatetime=#CURRENTTIME:TIMESTAMP#, updateuserguid=#UPDATEUSERGUID#, SOLUTIONNAME=#SOLUTIONNAME#,
WHERE guid = #GUID#
